description: This table contains one row for each line of each temporary accounts receivable (TAR) record (think of a TAR record as one charge entry screen and each line as an individual procedure). Deleting charge lines from Chronicles will delete rows from this table. This table contains basic information about the procedure and its charge review history. This table also contains the current status of the TAR record. This is found in the CHARGE_STATUS_C column.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the temporary transaction record.

columns.name: CHARGE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the charge on this temporary transaction record.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The service date on which the charge procedure is performed.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area the charge was entered into.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SA table.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the revenue location the charge was entered into.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_LOC table.

columns.name: PROC_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department the charge was entered into.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_DEP table.

columns.name: PROC_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service the charge was entered into.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_POS table.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage on the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN table.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account  on the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the performing provider related to the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing provider related to the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of procedure entered on the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.  This is NOT the CPT � Code.

columns.name: QTY
columns.description: The quantity on the charge.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.description: The dollar amount on the charge.

columns.name: ENTER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who entered the charge.    This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: FILE_DATE
columns.description: The date the temporary charge was posted into a transaction. If this field is blank the charge has not been posted into a transaction. It is either still in the workqueue�(both the file date and delete date are blank) or has been deleted (the delete date field is populated).  This date will match the post date in CLARITY_TDL.

columns.name: FILE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who corrected the error of the charges.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction the charge is stored within a temporary transaction.

columns.name: DELETE_DATE
columns.description: The date the charge was deleted.  If this field is blank the charge has not been deleted.  It is either still in the WQ (both the file date and delete date are blank) or has been filed into ETR (the file date field is populated).

columns.name: DELETE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who deleted the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral provider related to the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: RECEIVE_DATE
columns.description: The receive date for a charge. This date is entered by users in charge entry.

columns.name: CODER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coder on the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.  This data is entered by users in charge entry.

columns.name: CODED_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the charge was coded.  This date is entered by users in charge entry.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bill area is associated with the charge.  This column is frequently used to link to the BILL_AREA table.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: SESS_BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bill area is associated with the charge session (TAR).  This column is frequently used to link to the BILL_AREA table.

columns.name: SESS_BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the surgical log record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_LOG table. This item is populated if charge is entered from OpTime (Epic's operating room management application).

columns.name: SUPPLY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the supply record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_SPLY table.

columns.name: SUPPLY_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the implant record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_IMP table.

columns.name: SESS_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department associated with the charge session (Temporary Accounts Receivable).  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_DEP table.

columns.name: SESS_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service associated with the charge session (Temporary Accounts Receivable).  This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_POS table.

columns.name: CHARGE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category number of the charge.  This column will only be populated if the charge is not posted through the normal professional billing charge entry workflow.  Charge source could be 1-Transaction Import, 2-Interface, 3-EpicCare, 4-Inpatient Charge Utility, 5-Hospital Professional Fee, 6-Inpatient Professional Charge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Transaction Import


Interface


EpicCare


Inpatient Charge Utility


Hospital Professional Fee


Inpatient Professional Charge


Payment Plan Auto-Pay

columns.name: CHARGE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number of the charge.  1-Filed without Review, 2-Filed after Review, 3-In Review, 4-Deleted, 5-Created, 6-Deleted in Charge Review.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Filed without Review


Filed after Review


In Review


Deleted


Created


Deleted in Charge Review

columns.name: SESS_PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The performing provider, also called the service provider, associated with the charge session.

columns.name: SESS_BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The billing provider associated with the charge session.

columns.name: DENTAL_ENTRY_FLG
columns.description: Indicates if the procedure is a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_SURFACE
columns.description: The tooth surface for the dental procedure. The value could be a semicolon-delimited string if there are multiple surfaces. For example, 2;3.

columns.name: DENTAL_ARCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The arch info for the dental procedure. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lower


Upper

columns.name: DENTAL_QUADRANT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The quadrant info for the dental procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lower Left


Lower Right


Upper Left


Upper Right


Whole Oral Cavity


Maxillary Area


Mandibular Area


Upper Right Sextant


Upper Anterior Sextant


Upper Left Sextant


Lower Left Sextant


Lower Anterior Sextant


Lower Right Sextant

columns.name: DENTAL_AREA
columns.description: The area info for dental procedure. The value is a dash-delimited string of two tooth numbers. It indicates the area between the two teeth. For example, 2-3.

columns.name: DENTAL_SUPNUMARY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this�dental procedure is for a supernumerary.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DENTAL_MO_TO_RECALL
columns.description: The number of months after which follow-up is needed for the dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_HYGIENIST_ID
columns.description: The hygienist for the dental procedure.

columns.name: ANES_SUPPLEMENTAL
columns.description: Indicate if the procedure is anesthesia or supplemental procedure. 1 means the procedure is an anesthesia procedure. 2 means the procedure is a supplemental procedure.

columns.name: TIMED
columns.description: Indicate if the procedure uses timed algorithm.

columns.name: ADJUD_SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated self-pay amount.

columns.name: ADJUD_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated copay portion of the self-pay amount.

columns.name: ADJUD_COINS_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated coinsurance portion of the self-pay amount.

columns.name: ADJUD_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated deductible portion of the self-pay amount.

columns.name: ADJUD_OVRIDE_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
A flag to indicate if and how the adjudicated self-pay amount was overridden.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Benefit Package Adjudication Formula


Coverage Level Override


Plan Level Override


Copay Suppressed


Payor Level Override Programming Point


Service Area Level Override Programming Point


Waived - Secondary Coverage Available


Copay Computation Function Programming Point

columns.name: OLD_RETRO_ETR_ID
columns.description: Unique ID of old�retroadjudication transactions.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT
columns.description: The price for each unit for a procedure.

columns.name: NIA_NIDUS_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The National Imaging Association


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Positive


Negative


Equivocal


Significant Incidental

columns.name: SPEC_SUP_PROC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special supplemental procedure type category ID for the temporary transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Age Unit


Emergency Unit

columns.name: ANES_PROCEDURE_LINK
columns.description: The line in the charge session that created this charge line. This happens for anesthesia supplemental procedures, charge shadowing, and charge quantity splitting.

columns.name: ANES_ASA_CODE_ID
columns.description: The ASA (American Society of Anesthesiologists) code for a procedure.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The order that is linked to this charge.

columns.name: RESEARCH_STUDY_ID
columns.description: The record ID for the research study or client associated with the charge.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_CSN
columns.description: Contact serial number of the charge's linked protocol version within linked research study or linked treatment plan.

columns.name: RSH_CHG_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value to indicate how a charge related to a research study was routed, either to the research study guarantor account or to the patient's account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


File to Study


File to Patient

columns.name: FIN_DIV_ID
columns.description: The financial division associated with the charge.

columns.name: FIN_DIV_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: FIN_SUBDIV_ID
columns.description: The financial subdivision associated with the charge.

columns.name: FIN_SUBDIV_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: CREATE_DATE
columns.description: The date the charge was created.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the treatment plan that generated this charge and order.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association linked to this charge.

columns.name: DENTAL_PREAUTH_QTY
columns.description: Stores the quantity that will be sent to insurance for preauthorization for the associated charge line

columns.name: PROC_INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: Free text regarding the specific procedure.

columns.name: FAST_PAY_SP_BALANCE
columns.description: Self-pay balance for use with fast payment.

columns.name: REF_OVERRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who overrode the referral associated with this charge line.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: This items stores the referral ID for a charge line.
